author: wemeetagain
content: Hi everyone ðŸ‘‹  I missed the intro meeting, but I'm a mentor, a client developer working on Lodestar. I'm very open and willing to help anyone with anything related to consensus, client codebases, or anything related to browsers / browser compatibility. No such thing as a dumb question, feel free to ping me and I'll try to point you in the right direction.

author: mariohavel
content:
Weekly standup call starts in an hour! Looking forward to hear your updates. Join at 3PM UTC here https://meet.ethereum.org/epf-standup
<@&857649635274915900>

content: I cannot attend today, but ping me if anything related to EVM is needed.

author: potuz
content: Tried a couple of times and didn't work, at this stage already lost half the meeting :), will try next time. It's also impossible to test before since the test passes and all sounds are clear, except voices that are completely mute

author: mariohavel
content: Sorry about that Potuz! This is weird, it seems like a browser issue. But there will be a recording if you are interested

author: mariohavel
content: Best foss solution I am aware of, so far it works great. Do you have issues with other instances like meet.jit.si?

author: mariohavel
content: Reminder about the office hours call tomorrow. If there is anything you would like to discuss, please add it to the agenda. If there are no topics for tomorrow by end of today, we will postpone the call to the next week https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/issues/78 <@&857649635274915900>

author: bemtg
content: I was having the same issue last time. I ended up turning off my web extensions and it started working again. <@562272615868137472> <@755590043632140352>

content: There was no agenda for tomorrow so the call is moved for the next week. Please feel free to add something there during this week
